Class Depot

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.Component
org.mio.progettoingsoft.components.Depot
public class Depot extends Component
Represents a "Depot" component on a spaceship, used for storing goods. Depots can vary in size (big or not) and hazard status, which affects their maximum storage capacity and ability to store hazardous (red) goods. It extends the base Component class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Depot

      public Depot(int id, boolean isBig, boolean isHazard, Connector topConn, Connector bottomConn, Connector rightConn, Connector leftConn)
      Constructs a new Depot component. The maximum quantity of goods the depot can store is determined by its isBig and isHazard properties: - Big and Not Hazard: 3 goods - Hazard and Not Big: 1 good - Otherwise (Big and Hazard, or Not Big and Not Hazard): 2 goods
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this component.
      isBig - A boolean indicating if this is a large depot.
      isHazard - A boolean indicating if this depot can store hazardous goods.
      topConn - The connector on the top side of the component.
      bottomConn - The connector on the bottom side of the component.
      rightConn - The connector on the right side of the component.
      leftConn - The connector on the left side of the component.

  • Method Details

    • getHazard

      public boolean getHazard()
      Indicates if this depot is a hazard depot.
      Overrides:
      getHazard in class Component
      Returns:
      true if the depot can store hazardous goods, false otherwise.

      Indicates if this depot is a big depot.

      Overrides:

      Returns:

    • addGood

      public void addGood(GoodType type) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Adds a GoodType to the depot.
      Overrides:
      addGood in class Component
      Parameters:
      type - The type of good to add.
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the depot is full or if a red (hazardous) good is attempted to be stored in a non-hazard depot.

    • removeGood

      public void removeGood(GoodType type) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Removes a GoodType from the depot.
      Overrides:
      removeGood in class Component
      Parameters:
      type - The type of good to remove.
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the specified good type is not found in the depot.

    • canContainsGood

      public boolean canContainsGood(GoodType type) throws IncorrectShipBoardException
      Checks if the depot can contain a specific type of good. This considers both capacity and whether it's a hazard depot for red goods.
      Overrides:
      canContainsGood in class Component
      Parameters:
      type - The type of good to check.
      Returns:
      true if the good can be added, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IncorrectShipBoardException - if the component is not a Depot
